singleJoke.joke: What did the shy pebble with for? That she was a little boulder.

A ghost walks into a bar and asks for a glass of vodka. The bartender says, "Sorry, we don't serve spirits.
Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation towards the local swimming pool. I gave him a glass of water.
What’s the longest word in the dictionary? Smiles. Because there’s a mile between the two Ss
I'll never forget my Granddad's last words to me just before he died. "Are you still holding the ladder?"

A neutron walks into a bar and asks for a price on a drink.
The barkeeper says: "For you... no charge!"
There's two fish in a tank. One turns to the other and says, "Do you know how to drive this thing?"

What did the Buffalo say to his little boy when he dropped him off at school? 
Bison.

Which side of the chicken has more feathers? 
The outside.

Why do cows wear bells? 
Because their horns don't work!
What did the big flower say to the littler flower? Hi, bud!
which flower is most fierce? Dandelion

What do you call a pile of cats? 
A meowtain.
